ISSUE.TITLE: NopEditorFor with wrong signature used
ISSUE.DESCRIPTION: \Nop.Web\Administration\Views\Language\_CreateOrUpdate.cshtml @Html.NopEditorFor(model => model.FlagImageFileName, false) uses wrong signature shouldn't it be @Html.NopEditorFor(model => model.FlagImageFileName, renderFormControlClass: false)

BUGGYCOMMIT.MESSAGE: Removed extra check from 'Customer settings' page
